name: caddy-manager
title: Caddy Manager
description: Quickly manage Caddy server configurations, including enabling, disabling, reloading, and controlling server states.
author: amassdev

commands.name: caddy
commands.title: Manage Caddy Server
commands.description: A comprehensive tool to manage Caddy server configurations, including enabling configurations, reloading, starting, stopping, and checking the server's status.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
